title: Survey on amount of money spent on boating in the U.S. 2012
summary: This chart shows the Percentage of boat owners at the U.S. from Yearly under_500$ to over_$5000 .
\\n From the chart we see that the Percentage of boat owners were 30.5 , at their highest in under_500$ .
\\n The boat owners slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Yearly to 15.5 in $500_to_$999 .
gold: The statistic depicts the amount of money boat owners in the U.S. spent on boating in 2012 . 18.3 percent of the respondents stated that they spent between $ 1,000 and $ 1,999 on boating in 2012 .
